backend/main.mo: Actor managing profiles, user profiles, ratings, and authorization with persistent maps and access‑controlled CRUD operations.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old profiles lacking an owner field into new profiles with owner set to null.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a deployment promotion request to specific frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend files, styling updates, animations, and component behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and global border/background utilities.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point loading the React app and preloading audio assets.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component composing layout, background, scheme grid, modals, profile card, and floating buttons.
frontend/src/components/background/Cinem: Full‑screen background video with gradient overlays and vignette effects to ensure text contrast.
frontend/src/components/calculator/LiveC: Interactive interest calculator with animated output and scheme‑specific return logic.
frontend/src/components/footer/Footer.ts: Simple footer displaying copyright text with official styling.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryC: Interactive gallery card with sound feedback, animated icons, and gradient‑styled hover effects.
frontend/src/components/gallery/galleryI: Defines the GalleryImage interface and exports a static list of gallery image metadata.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryL: Lightbox viewer with navigation, download, close controls, and click-sound feedback for gallery images.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryM: Gallery modal showing image grid and launching the lightbox with keyboard navigation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/header/FrostedHe: Frosted header with branding, location, and IT 2.0 button that opens a modal with click-sound feedback.
frontend/src/components/header/It20Modal: Modal describing India Post IT 2.0, with ESC handling, backdrop close, and animated close button.
frontend/src/components/ippb/IppbFloatin: Floating IPPB action button with pulsing animation that opens an overlay dialog.
frontend/src/components/ippb/IppbGridCar: Grid card for IPPB services that opens its dialog on click or keyboard activation with sound feedback.
frontend/src/components/ippb/IppbOverlay: Animated glass-style modal showcasing IPPB services with icon sections and close-sound handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/Dashboard: Basic layout wrapper providing a full‑screen container for dashboard content.
frontend/src/components/motto/RightEdgeM: Fixed right-edge vertical motto text displayed on large screens.
frontend/src/components/notice/CloneWork: Notice component explaining requirements for exact website cloning with a styled warning layout.
frontend/src/components/profile/BpmProfi: Interactive BPM profile card with expand animations, image preview, and post-close rating prompt.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileI: Full-screen animated image preview overlay with fade/zoom transitions and escape/backdrop close handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileR: Rating dialog allowing users to submit 1–5 star feedback and showing submission state.
frontend/src/components/profile/Typewrit: Typewriter-style text renderer for profile lines with animated cursor and highlighted name handling.
frontend/src/components/prompt/PromptCop: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/schemes/SchemeCa: Clickable scheme card showing icon, description, and hover effects with sound feedback.
frontend/src/components/schemes/SchemeGr: Renders a grid of all postal schemes along with gallery and IPPB cards, triggering callbacks on selection. Uses SchemeCard, GalleryCard, and IppbGridCard components.
frontend/src/components/schemes/SchemeMo: Displays a modal showing scheme details and tabs with close-sound behavior. Differentiates RBP schemes for styling.
frontend/src/components/schemes/SchemeTa: Provides tabbed content for a scheme including history, eligibility, benefits, documents, and a live calculator. Applies special styling for RBP schemes.
frontend/src/components/schemes/useSchem: Custom hook managing selected scheme state and modal open/close behavior with delayed clearing for animations.
frontend/src/components/support/CallFloa: Floating button that initiates a phone call to a fixed number with animated glow styling.
frontend/src/components/support/WhatsApp: Floating WhatsApp contact button linking to a prefilled chat with tooltip and animated effects.
frontend/src/components/testimonials/Tes: Creates a continuously scrolling marquee showing duplicated testimonials with consistent styling. Includes star ratings and author details.
frontend/src/components/warning/Copyrigh: Modal displaying a copyright warning message with animated red styling and close-sound support.
frontend/src/components/warning/WarningS: Shows an info button that opens the copyright warning dialog, supporting keyboard access and click sounds.
frontend/src/data/schemes.ts: Defines scheme types, calculator config, tab content, and data for postal savings schemes including SB, SSA, RD, MIS, TD, and PLI_RPLI.
frontend/src/data/testimonials.ts: Defines testimonial types and provides a list of customer testimonials with name, location, and message.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioUnlock.ts: Registers one-time user-gesture listeners to unlock audio playback on browsers with autoplay restrictions.
frontend/src/hooks/useClickSound.ts: Provides tap and close sound playback with preloaded audio, debouncing, and safe autoplay handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useGlobalTapSound.ts: Adds a global pointerdown listener that plays a tap sound with throttling and input-field exclusion.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, loading, login, logout, and identity state via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfileRating.ts: Fetches and submits profile ratings through the backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for a dark luxury theme with color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, React Query, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, transitions, and container settings, including smooth zoom and pulse ring effects.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, versioning, and a single existing feature related to promoting a draft deployment to production.
